item.name: Vessels GraphQL BETA

request.description:
Returns all fields available in the Vessels V2 Beta Query "Vessels" for first 10 vessels with the shipType General Cargo and Container.

Argument(s) used: shipType, first

Returns data for some fields available in the Vessels V2 Beta Query "Vessels" for the first 100 vessels after the last request made to the service. 

Argument(s) used: after, first

Returns data for all fields available in the Vessels V2 Beta Query "Vessels" for all vessels in a specified AOI.

Argument(s) used: areaOfInterest

Returns data for all fields available in the Vessels V2 Beta Query "Vessels" for all vessels globally. Filtered using an mmsi list of 100 vessels.

Argument(s) used: mmsi

Returns all fields available in the Vessels V2 Beta Query "Vessels" for first 10 vessels with the shipType General Cargo and Container.

Argument(s) used: shipType, first
Returns all fields available in the Vessels V2 Beta Query "Vessels" for all vessels globally. No arguments are applied to filter the output data.

Returns data for some fields available in the Vessels V2 Beta Query "Vessels" for the first 100 vessels which last position was updated between the specified startTime and endTime.

Argument(s) used: lastPositionUpdate, first

item.description: This folder contains sample queries to use with the Vessels V2 Beta API.
